# [GitHub]

This directory is for the configuration regarding our repository on the
[GitHub].

[github]: https://docs.github.com/

## üìÇ Directory structure

| Path                          | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| ----------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| üìÇ [workflows/](./workflows)  | Directory with configured workflow for [GitHub] Actions. [Learn more](https://docs.github.com/en/actions/learn-github-actions/introduction-to-github-actions)                                                                   |
| ‚öôÔ∏è [CODEOWNERS](./CODEOWNERS) | A [GitHub] file to define the **code owners** for this project. [Learn more](https://docs.github.com/en/github/creating-cloning-and-archiving-repositories/creating-a-repository-on-github/about-code-owners#about-code-owners) |
